description:
Requested to supply 2no 4.2m3 booster pumps at max 8 bar pressure from supplier (APS Fluid).
Pumps supplied did not match the pump curved given to us and were from different manufacturer. 
Pumps fitted on site but were blowing pressure relief valves down stream.
Contacted supplier numerous times by phone and email but failed to reply to us.
Current fix is to supply 2no VSDs to pump which we have ordered from NORD.
1:
Requested to supply 2no 4.2m3 booster pumps at max 8 bar pressure from supplier (APS Fluid).
